name: Bloodfest
description:
Your patron deity, the dark lord, is in need of a lot of blood! He asks you, his number one slave, to go out and get him some. He gave you a baseball bat and showed you to a flock of eyeballs, plump and full of blood. Smash them to paste and steal their blood with your baseball bat in this fun little arena hack and slash.

Objective:

Obliterate the eyeballs, steal their blood, and live as long as possible.

Features:

- Squishy eyeballs

- Self-paced gameplay

- Healing on each blood reward

- Build up a blood level that increases your score

Controls:

WASD to move, Mouse to aim and left-mouse to swing your bat.
